responses.rationale: The segment reports a positive test result, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment reports a detection, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Mentions 'studies are still underway to understand the cause' which is a research/understanding capability.
The segment describes the historical pattern and current spread of the virus.
The segment describes a likely cause of spread.
Mentions 'condors are still receiving supportive care' which is a response measure/safeguard.
The segment reports deaths and positive tests.
Mentions 'premature to sign anything or commit to anything' which relates to future planning/action.
Mentions 'mindful of the equity issue needing to be addressed' and 'has no contracts yet' which relates to future planning/action.
The segment states results will be watched.
Mentions 'plans to launch a small human trial' and 'could respond very quickly' which are capability/preparedness statements.
Mentions 'research actually began with pandemic flu' which is a historical capability.
Mentions 'proved the potential of mRNA technology to adapt more quickly' which is a capability statement.
Mentions 'Experts have long advocated for new approaches in developing vaccines' which is about future possibilities/development.
Describes 'a traditional method, growing the virus' which is a capability/method statement.
Mentions 'moving to large-scale production... could take months' which is a capability/limitation statement.
Mentions 'Existing antiviral treatments... will also help mitigate the impact' which is a safeguard/treatment capability.
Mentions 'close to 20 licensed vaccines' which is a resource/capability statement.
Mentions 'Data on how well the vaccines actually protect... would be gathered in real-time' which is a capability/surveillance statement.
Mentions 'manufacturers would shift production' and 'already have the capacity' which are capability/preparedness statements.
Mentions 'mechanisms were being developed so that countries can work together' which is a capability/plan statement.
Mentions 'signed legally binding agreements with 14 manufacturers' which is a plan/resource statement.
Mentions 'seeking guarantees of 20% global supply' which is a plan/resource statement.
Mentions 'An international framework for pandemic flu allocates 10% of global supply' which is a plan/resource allocation.
Mentions 'Many countries' pandemic plans say flu shots should go first' which is a plan/strategy statement.
Mentions 'potential human doses are earmarked for wealthy countries in long-standing preparedness contracts' which is a preparedness/resource statement.
Mentions 'push among companies to develop a bird flu vaccine' which is a development capability.
Mentions 'stand ready to begin production if needed, with existing H5N1 vaccine strains in stock' which is a preparedness/resource statement.
Mentions 'are already developing or about to test sample human vaccines... as a precautionary measure' which is a development/preparedness statement.
Mentions 'could make hundreds of millions of bird flu shots for humans within months' which is a capability/resource statement.
Mentions 'officials quarantined the affected premises and established a 10-kilometer surveillance zone' which are response measures/safeguards.
Mentions 'the department will test other flocks within a 10-kilometer (6-mile) zone in collaboration' which is a capability/response measure.
Mentions 'the flock... was killed and was being composted to guard against spread' which is a safeguard/response measure.
The segment reports a positive test result.
Mentions 'ducks and hens have been culled... as authorities try to contain the spread' which is a safeguard/response measure.
